News.headline: 50/50 Draw Forest Green Rovers
News.short_description: The winner for the Daggers' Vanarama National League game versus Forest Green Rovers is ticket number 06278
News.description:
The winning ticket worth £155 was drawn at half time. The winning ticket was claimed by Steve Gibbs. 

Second place winner for the £50 Johnstone's Paint voucher is ticket number 06616, which was claimed by James Newton

50/50 tickets can be purchased on match days for £1.
